element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetGridAndChild
element.short: Set datasource connection of parent and child grids.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetGridColumns
element.short: Set columns properties of a grid.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetSearchBar
element.short: Set the search bar visible or not.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetSidePanel
element.short: Set the (right) side panel visible or not.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetSideIndex
element.short: Set the active tab index of the side panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.LoadRecordColumns
element.short: Loads the column names in the record view.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateFilterPanels
element.short: Set visible the filter panels for the current table type.
